Method Detail

createImage

void createImage(java.io.OutputStream stream,
                 java.lang.String text)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Create an image which have witten a distorted text, text given as parameter. The result image is put on the output stream

Parameters:
stream - the OutputStrea where the image is written
text - the distorted characters written on imagage
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an error occurs during the image written on output stream.
